description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Iris 2.0 is a Music Visualizer Creation Studio that features a suite of tools that allow you to easily and intuitively create your own Music Visualizers, which can be shared with other users over Xbox Live.  Iris 2.0 can access music on your Xbox or PC. It comes with 10 Classic and 21 Custom Visualizers. Pick your favorite songs, build a perfect Visualizer, and then sit back and enjoy the show!
